com.std.model.pattern

Class NDaysPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.std.model.pattern.RecurrencePattern
      • com.std.model.pattern.NDaysPattern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NDaysPattern
extends RecurrencePattern
    This class is the representation of a pattern that would exist every N number of days. If the user would like an appointment to exist over a periodic number of days, then this is the class that would deal with it
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
